hero.title: Room to remember
hero.highlight: A multi-sensory experience curated for Hotel Beige guests

what.title: The scent of arrival, the memory of a stay
paragraphs: Imagine a guest’s first moment in the room : soft light, a view of the Parisian architecture… and a delicate, hand-selected perfume waiting just for them.
I would like to propose a curated Welcome Scent Box : three perfume samples chosen with care, presented in a design that echoes the unique identity of Hotel Beige

why.title: Why it makes sense
why.subtitle: As regular guests, you have already made Hotel Beige your home. Over the years, you have created memories and built a relationship with the place and the staff. This is what moved me when I first met you.

reasons.title: Ingrédients d'exception
reasons.description: Des essences rares provenant des quatre coins du monde, sélectionnées par nos maîtres parfumeurs.

reasons.title: Savoir-faire artisanal
reasons.description: Chaque flacon est assemblé à la main selon des techniques transmises de génération en génération.

reasons.title: Expérience unique
reasons.description: Plus qu'un parfum, c'est une invitation au voyage dans l'univers du luxe absolu.

contact.title: I would love to explore this collaboration with you and refine it together.
